text: Hardenbergh is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * Augustus Albert Hardenbergh, Congressman from New Jersey * Henry Janeway Hardenbergh, American architect * Johannes Hardenbergh, High Sheriff * Jacob Hardenbergh (1823–1872), New York politician * Jacob Rutsen Hardenbergh (1736–1790), First President of Rutgers, grandson of Johannes == See also == * Hardenbergh, alternate name for Hardenburg, California * Isaac Hardenbergh House (also known as The Hardenbergh Manor) * Hardenberg (surname) * Hardenberg (disambiguation) * Hardenburg (disambiguation) Category:Dutch-language surnames
title: Hardenbergh
